channel.title: [PI]How To Edit Command Rights?

item.title: [PI]How To Edit Command Rights?
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

Go to commands.java and look for;

public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {

under that add

[code=java] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >= 2) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong.Try using ::item id ammount. Example: ::item 15027 1.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			} // HERE?
			} // HERE?[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]How To Edit Command Rights?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“I like rods4, post:1, topic:397594”]Hi… How Would I Edit The Command Rights To This Command?

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) if (c.playerRights == #) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {

                                            int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			} // HERE?
			} // HERE?[/code][/quote]

Try that code. Change the # to the rights you want it to be. It also might be this:

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
if (c.playerRights == #)
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			} // HERE?
			} // HERE?[/code]

OR:

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) && c.playerRights == 0) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {

                                            int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			} // HERE?
			} // HERE?[/code]

Here’s my code:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); }
